(22015x729+665)/64 mod 1024 = 919. (22015x2187+2059)/128 mod 512 = 355. (22015x6561+6305)/256 mod 256 = 21. (22015x19683+19171)/512 mod 128 = 32. (22015x19683+19171)/1024 mod 64 = 16. (22015x19683+19171)/2048 mod 32 = 8. (22015x19683+19171)/4096 mod 16 = 4. (22015x19683+19171)/8192 mod 8 = 2. (22015x19683+19171)/16384 mod 4 = 1. (22015x59049+73897)/32768 mod 2 = 0. (22015x59049+73897)/65536 mod 1 = 0.
